ygData.subject: Re: FYI Vendor
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I thought the same thing at first, while yes the runes were towards the bottom, the words (about 7 total) were right at the top all next to each other. So
ygData.messageBody:
mstokes wrote:

> From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
> Most likely they were sold to that vendor by another PC who doesn't know or care about their value. I have seen
> them being sold by a lot of NPC's and its always at the bottom of their list of wares.

I thought the same thing at first, while yes the runes were towards the bottom, the words (about 7 total) were right
at the top all next to each other. So unless someone found an empty Merchant (I have seen them) and sold many words
back at one time, I would believe this is a real vendor, one more thing to think this way, as I mentioned before it
was an unmarked house but there was 2 vendors in it and one sold general goods. One more thing, they were all priced
between 2 and 3 platinum and thats with 60 charisma, the bad thing about Gnome Wizards.

>
>
> Tom Matthews wrote:
>
> > From: Tom Matthews <tmatthews@...>
> >
> > I just recently joined this list but why searching for flecting
> > materials last night I found a Merchant in Freeport (North Freeport
> > Market Square) near the bank in a unmarked house selling a lot of words
> > and a couple ruins.
> >
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Give back to your community through "Grow to Give."
> http://www.ONElist.com
> See homepage for details.
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> This list is intended for the trade of Spell components for spell research. Please keep the emails on topic.
